br.com.concepting.framework.service

Class BaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.service.BaseService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRemoteService

    public abstract class BaseService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IService
    Classe que define a estrutura básica para uma classe de serviço.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
